catalysts.thesis: Turnaround play confirmed by a massive 66% EPS beat ($0.10 vs $0.06 est) reported today. Despite the profitability surge and reaffirmed outlook, the stock is virtually flat (+0.07%), suggesting the market has not yet priced in the operational improvements and cost savings.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q1 2026 Earnings Report (Released Feb 10, 2026). EPS of $0.10 beat estimates of $0.06. Reaffirmed fiscal 2026 outlook with expected EBITDA improvement.
catalysts.absorption_status: Unpriced. Stock is trading flat (+0.07%) despite a significant bottom-line beat, likely due to a minor revenue miss, offering an asymmetric entry.
catalysts.risk: Revenue miss (-0.26%) indicates top-line pressure remains; turnaround execution risk.
catalysts.expected_upside: 15-20% (Re-rating to peer multiples on improved profitability)
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: 66% EPS beat met with 0% price action; PEAD setup.

catalysts.thesis: Semiconductor equipment supplier signaling the 'trough is over' with a Q4 beat and Q1 guidance significantly above consensus ($250M revenue midpoint vs $239M est). The stock rose ~6% post-market, staying within the 8% buy limit, validating the trend without overextending.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 2025 Earnings & Strong Q1 2026 Guidance (Reported Feb 9, 2026). Beat EPS ($0.01 vs -$0.06) and Revenue.
catalysts.absorption_status: Partially Absorbed. Stock up ~6% in reaction, but improved guidance suggests a longer-term cyclical rotation is beginning.
catalysts.risk: Cyclical semiconductor recovery could be slower than anticipated.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Guidance raise suggests material business improvement not fully captured by a single-digit pop.

catalysts.thesis: Consistent compounder delivered another double beat (EPS $0.54 vs $0.49) today with minimal price reaction (+1.9%). High-quality medical device play (MRI pumps) trading at a discount to its growth consistency.
catalysts.catalyst_details: Q4 Earnings Report (Released Feb 10, 2026). Beat on top and bottom lines.
catalysts.absorption_status: Unpriced. +1.9% move is negligible for a clean beat, suggesting a 'drift' opportunity as analysts revise targets upward.
catalysts.risk: Valuation is premium; limited liquidity in pre-market.
catalysts.mispricing_evidence: Beat and raise not reflected in price action.
